name: Scooby Doo Hollywood Horror Part 1 Remake
name_original: Scooby Doo Hollywood Horror Part 1 Remake
description: Scooby Doo Hollywood Horror Part 1 was a Shockwave Flash game created in the early 2000's. With the discontinuation of Flash, the game has become harder to find (It is in the FlashPoint project). I decided to try and recreate this game as a way to help me learn Game Maker. I am planning on remaking part 2. If you find any bugs please add a comment about it. (This is a fan remake. I did not make any of the assets. The game may trigger a false positive by an anti-virus.)
